title: Join Our Minecraft Server
description: Ready to play? Follow these steps to join our server.

fields.name: ⚙️ Requirements
fields.value:
• Minecraft Java Edition 1.21.4
• Fabric Loader (For Non-cracked clients)
• Simple Voice Chat mod

fields.name: 🚀 Installation Steps
fields.value:
1. Install Fabric Loader from [fabricmc.net](https://fabricmc.net/use/)
2. Download Simple Voice Chat mod from [CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/simple-voice-chat)
3. Place mod in your `.minecraft/mods` folder

fields.name: 🔓 Crack (Legacy Launcher) Tutorial
fields.value:
1. Download and install [Legacy Launcher](https://llaun.ch/)
2. Create a new profile with Fabric version 1.21.4
3. Add Simple Voice Chat and other necessary mods to the profile's mods folder
4. Launch the game and connect to `play.uduality.site`
